column5: BYND INGR BG After great financial report on Friday which make a strong jump of 69 in 2 days the stock is now down 20 when in the premarket it was already 93One of the reasons is that JP Morgan published their recomend with the price of 121 28 down then yesterday close priceYesterday I talked about the option in the meat substitute market that after BYND already did a strong move it will be smart to buy the competitors stockI explained it in this video PLEASE SUBSCRIBE LIKE AND SHARE youtubecomwatchvdTEdwy My analysis on BYND youtubecomwatchv5PNvLm8
